version_description: minor bug fixes

•Enhanced sign up
•Minor Bug Fixes

• Enhanced sign up
• Minor Bug Fixes
- minor bug fixes

- Processing updates for improved delivery of faxes
- New sign up options with in-app purchase now available via iTunes (USA only)

•2015 App Design Award winner!!! - New look and feel! Sign, send and receive faxes with our free faxing app.
•Scan any document or attach an existing document, and fax it instantly.
•Need more pages? A toll-free fax number for your business? Buy with ease from the eFax® app.
•Enhanced fax delivery and performance.

• Faxing with eFax® is now better than ever! Send and receive faxes with ease.
• Never miss a message. Receive in-app and email alerts each time you receive and send a fax.
• Convenient, in-app fax viewer displays inbound fax documents. Double tap to zoom in and out. Search function helps you find faxes or advance to other pages quickly.
• Send faxes in a snap. Scan or upload documents. The eFax® mobile app supports 20+ file types including PDF, DOC, PPT, JPEG, JPG and more.
• Create a personalized fax cover page and sign documents electronically with the touch of your finger.
• Enhanced document management - create folders, tag faxes and store them in the cloud or on your device.
• Getting a premium eFax® account is now simple with iTunes in-app purchase (US customers only for now).

• Bug fixes to improve app performance

• Create a personalized fax cover page, sign documents electronically with the touch of your finger.

• Bug fixes
• Navigation and design updates for even easier faxing
• New Touch-id login
• Ability to rotate fax image
• Ability to attach multiple documents or photos at once
• Ability to edit Work Number, Company Name, Home Number, User Name and Password in Settings
• Ability to send photo to eFax app on Compose Fax screen.

Thanks for your input. We hope you like this update. Please send your suggestions to iOS@efax.com.

Thanks for using eFax! We update the app so it is more reliable for our users. In this update:
• Optimized for iPhone X.
• Ability to attach documents from inside the eFax app.
• Resolves issues for: unread faxes, double pages, icon badge count and required Comments field.

If you have any feedback please send it to ios@efax.com.
